title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When performing a search for references to the field in an external jar file, the search results are not being selected automatically.
EB: The search results in the external jar file should be selected automatically after performing the search for references to the field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source fort.jar)
2. Open java.io.File
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'
4. Perform a search for references to this field in the external jar file

Expected result: The search results in the external jar file should be selected automatically.
